job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Job DescriptionAs a Software Engineer, you will:Be involved in full-stack web application development with a variety of languages and frameworks including Python, TypeScript, HTML, React, Flask, Postgres, etc.Work closely with our PM and design teams to define feature specifications and build impactful products.Work closely with operations to build user-friendly data visualization and processing software.Minimum Qualifications1-2+ years of experience in full stack web developmentB.S. Computer Science or related technical field preferred, fresh grad is also ok.Experience with Python and Javascript required1-2+ years of experience with Python1-2+ years of experience with Javascript1-2+ years of experience with relational databases and SQLExperience in ReactJS and Flask preferredExperience with AWS and GCP a plusExperience with AI a plus*********************************************************************We're urgently in need for a Senior Software Engineers.Know anyone who might be interested?Please fill-up on the below link, attach your updated CV and don't forget to take the coding challenge!!!Kindly mention my name on "referred by" https://lnkd.in/gmZYssbT#SWE#softwareengineerjobs#remotework#hiring#careers#nowhiring
